transactions.details: Milwaukee Brewersplaced LHPRob Zastryznyon the 15-day injured list retroactive to June 27, 2025. Ribs stress reaction.
Boston Red Soxsent LFMasataka Yoshidaon a rehab assignment to Worcester Red Sox.
New York Metssent LHPSean Manaeaon a rehab assignment to Binghamton Rumble Ponies.
Los Angeles Angelsactivated RFJorge Solerfrom the 10-day injured list.
Colorado Rockiesreassigned RFYanquiel Fernándezto the minor leagues.
Minnesota Twinsactivated 3BRoyce Lewisfrom the 10-day injured list.
Washington Nationalsactivated 3BPaul DeJongfrom the 10-day injured list.
Milwaukee Brewersrecalled RHPEaston McGeefrom Nashville Sounds.
Toronto Blue Jaysrecalled SSLeo Jiménezfrom Buffalo Bisons.
Washington Nationalsoptioned 1BAndrés Chaparroto Rochester Red Wings.
Toronto Blue Jaysoptioned LFJonatan Claseto Buffalo Bisons.
Milwaukee Brewersselected the contract of 2BAnthony Seiglerfrom Nashville Sounds.
